title.en: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~

altTitles.ja: その悪役貴族、ママヒロインが好きすぎる ～真摯な努力で最強となり不遇な推しキャラ助けまくる～

altTitles.en: The Villainous Noble Loves Mom Heroines Too Much ~Becoming The Strongest With Sincere Effort To Save Misfortunate Fave Chars~
That Villainous Aristocrat Is Actually Crazy About Mom Heroines: With His Earnest Hard Work, He Becomes the Strongest and Saves All of His Favorite Characters

description.en:
The mom characters who appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why… Why does such a cute mom have to die?!“ Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day… However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who’s got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who’s crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)

title.en: I Will Protect My Tyrant Dad!

description.en:
Reborn as a small-town child in a fantasy novel, Sien discovers her father is the exiled heir of a villainous duchy. Fearing their return to the ruthless family, she strives to protect him.  

But wait—her dad was once a tyrant?  

A heartwarming tale of a secretly powerful dad and his scheming daughter trying to preserve his innocence unfolds in this delightful mix of humor and healing misunderstandings.

title.en: "Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omou na" to Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta node, Outo de Kimama ni Kurashitai

altTitles.ja: 「お前ごときが魔王に勝てると思うな」と勇者パーティを追放されたので、王都で気ままに暮らしたい THE COMIC

altTitles.en: Do You Think Someone Like You Can Defeat the Demon King?

altTitles.zh: 「就凭你也想打败魔王吗」被勇者一行所驱逐的少女要如何才能在王都过上自由的生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 「憑妳也想討伐魔王？」被勇者小隊逐出隊伍，只好在王都自在過活

altTitles.zh-ro: "Jiù píng nǐ yě xiǎng dǎbài mówáng ma" bèi yǒngzhě yīxíng suǒ qūzhú de shàonǚ yào rúhé cáinéng zài wáng dōuguò shàng zìyóu de shēnghuó

altTitles.en: ROLL OVER AND DIE: I Will Fight for an Ordinary Life with My Love and Cursed Sword!

altTitles.vi: Ngươi Nghĩ Một Kẻ Như Ngươi Có Thể Tiêu Diệt Quỷ Vương?

description.en:
According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes.     

Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.”   The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met.    

——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

altTitles.de: Meine falschen Freundinnen benutzen mich als Schutzschild

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

altTitles.tr: Gençliklerini geri kazanan büyükbaba ve büyükanne hakkında hikaye

altTitles.en: A Story About a Grandpa and Grandma Who Returned Back to Their Youth

altTitles.id: Sebuah Kisah Tentang Kakek dan Nenek yang Kembali Ke Masa Mudanya.

altTitles.ru: История о Дедушке и Бабушке, которые снова стали молодыми

altTitles.uk: Історія про дідуся з бабусею, що знову стали молодими

altTitles.ja: おじいさんとおばあさんが若返った話。
じいさんばあさん若返る

altTitles.es-la: Un Abuelo y Una Abuela que Regresaron a su Juventud

altTitles.ja-ro: Ojii-san to Obaa-san ga Wakigaetta Hanashi

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre um vovô e uma vovó que voltaram à juventude

altTitles.ja: Jiisan Baasan Wakagaeru

description.en: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.
description.es:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.ja:
青森でリンゴ農家を営む老夫婦・正蔵とイネ。
ある日目覚めるとふたりは若い頃の姿になっていて！？
イケメンなじいさま＆美人なばあさまが巻き起こす、
お騒がせおしどり夫婦コメディ！
description.es-la:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.pt-br: História sobre Ine e Shouzou, dois aposentados com mais de 80 anos que misteriosamente voltaram aos 20 anos uma noite.

title.en: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!

altTitles.ja: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

altTitles.hu: A magára hagyott elf lány a világ legerősebb és legaranyosabbja!

description.en:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
description.hu:
**【Egykori toplistás játékos】+【Játékvilág】= Szuper verhetetlen!? Folytatom az életet a legerősebb énemmel!!**

„Kedves top játékosok! Ez a játék egy valós párhuzamos világ. Ha újjászülettek és megmentitek a világot, bármilyen kívánságotokat teljesítjük.”

Erre az istennő ajánlatára válaszolt Ayano, egykori népszerű szinkronszínész. Azért, hogy ismét ragyoghasson szinkronszínészként, a legerősebb faj, a nemes elf egyikeként született újjá. Most, a legerősebb és legaranyosabb állatfüles hősnővel karöltve, játékbeli tudását felhasználva célja a párhuzamos világban a „játék végigjátszása” - de vajon sikerül-e neki!?
description.ja:
「トッププレイヤーの皆様。このゲームは実在する異世界です。転生し、世界を救えばどんな願いも叶えてあげましょう」

女神からの提案に、元人気声優のアヤノは応えた。炎上して干された今、もう一度声優として輝くために。炎上後にゲームをやり込みトップランカーとなったアヤノは、その知識を生かして、最強種【ハイエルフ】に転生! 最強可愛いケモ耳ヒロイン・ホムラとともに異世界での“ゲームクリア”を目指すが、この世界はただの「ゲーム世界」ではないようで――!?

altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?
description.ru:
Герой пришел спасти спящую принцессу от проклятья злой ведьмы, но когда он добрался до места... Там оказалось 7 девушек!
Принц Рудбекии - Алек и семь принцесс, в стране, где они единственные бодрствующие, начинают свою совместную жизнь, чтобы освободить всех ото сна!
description.pt-br: Um príncipe errante partiu para quebrar uma antiga maldição que enfeitiça o Reino de Amaryllis, tentando despertar sua princesa com um beijo de amor verdadeiro. No entanto, ninguém lhe disse que havia sete princesas para beijar! Agora ele precisa assumir a responsabilidade, vivendo com elas enquanto descobrem por que o povo de Amaryllis está incapaz de despertar. Será que eles conseguirão um final feliz?

title.en: Ansatsu Koukyuu ~Ansatsu Nyokan Karin wa Yuttari Ikitai~

altTitles.ja: 暗殺後宮～暗殺女官・花鈴はゆったり生きたい～

altTitles.en: Palace of Assassins ~Assassin Hualing wants to live a simple life~

description.en: The imperial harem is where the world's beauties have all gathered. Karin (Hua Ling), a maid in training, dreams of making friends. However, due to her father's heinous acts as a politician, she spends tearful days with everyone too scared to approach her... It was then that she noticed that the young emperor, the only one willing to treat he with kindness, was being targeted by assassins. What will come of her as she becomes involved in the imperial harem's conspiracies while protecting the emperor with the assassination skills inherited from her father?
description.ja:
極悪政治家の父親のせいで恐れられ、避けられて育った花鈴（かりん）の夢は、後宮で友達を作ること。
見習い女官となった後宮で、孤独な幼き皇帝を守るため、 暗殺術を用いた闘いが始まるーー
はたして花鈴に友達は出来るのか！？

title.en: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance Is So BOSS-like, yet Everyone Believes It

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.ja: センシティブ・ボーイ

description.en: Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming “normal”…
description.ja: 過去に性被害を受けた少年・楓は『普通』になることに執着し…。

altTitles.ja: 虚の記憶
虚（から）の記憶

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

altTitles.ja: 探偵の式神

description.en: Nanato is an Onmyoji detective with good skills but a terrible attitude. He spends his days solving mysterious events together with Yachiyo, a puppet goddess of ceremony. Then, a high school boy named Tsutsu comes to him asking him to look for his missing sister. It is a harbinger of a great mystery...?
description.ja: 腕は良いが態度は最悪の陰陽師探偵・七都。人形式神の矢千代と共に、怪異を解決する日々を送っていた。そこに、行方不明の妹を捜してほしいと男子高生の綴が訪ねてくる。それはとてつもなく大きな怪異の前触れで!?

altTitles.en: Immortal Rain: Shinigami of the East
Meteor Methuselah: Shinigami of the East
The Grim Reaper of the East

altTitles.ja: 東方死神
東方死神 メテオ・メトセラ外伝

description.en:
From Inconnu:  
Zol, a bounty hunter who goes by the name of "Grim Reaper", spends his days chasing criminals under the orders of Fuse, his master and the city's respected major.  
One day, Zol takes up responsibility for burying a man who died in a hit-and-run on the streets. But much to his surprise, the supposedly dead man pops out of the coffin!! Is this the world's most wanted man, Methuselah?!  
This is the adventure-packed miniseries of the fateful encounter between the Methuselah named Rain and Zol the Grim Reaper, who is the grandfather of Immortal Rain's heroine Machika!!

title.en: It's a Cat, Adopted by a Wolf Family?

altTitles.ja: 猫なのにオオカミ一家の養子になりました

altTitles.en: You're a Cat, but You've Been Adopted by a Wolf Family?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un gato, pero... ¿fui adoptada por una familia de lobos?

description.es-la: Kitia, es una gatita huérfana. ¡El mundo da demasiado miedo para que un gatito viva solo! A Kitia se le ocurre un truco y se dirige al territorio de los lobos. "¿Hola? Mi nombre es Kitia, una loba joven pero valiente”. "...Definitivamente es un lobo".

description.en: This story is mainly about Maria and Aliette Margatroid, Alice and Marisa’s daughters. Yes, that’s right. I don’t even have words to describe this one

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

altTitles.en: Goblin Slayer! Side Story: Year One

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳：第一年

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất
Dũng Sĩ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất

description.en: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
description.pl:
Prequel ujawniający przeszłość Goblin Slayer'a i wydarzenia, które doprowadziły go do zostania poszukiwaczem przygód, któremu przyświeca wyłącznie jeden cel: eksterminacja wszystkich goblinów. ~M  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentosakaeda)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/goblinyo/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://yenpress.com/series-search/?series=yen346-goblin-slayer-side-story-year-one-light-novel)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma série de prequel que revela o passado de Goblin Slayer e os eventos que o levaram a se tornar um aventureiro com o único propósito de exterminar todos os goblins do mundo.
description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.
description.vi: Tiền truyện tiết lộ quá khứ của Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh và những sự kiện đã đưa anh trở thành một nhà thám hiểm với mục tiêu duy nhất là tiêu diệt toàn bộ yêu tinh trên thế giới

altTitles.ja: 泣かないきみに

description.en: Short story about Marisa and Reimu as children.

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...?
description.ja: 冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

title.en: Super! I'll Make A Habit Of It ♡

altTitles.ja: 超くせになりそう♡

description.en: ☆ I, Shiratori Nagisa, have a secret that I can't tell anyone. That is, pretending to be a boy and going to a normal junior high school ♡ The popular "I'll Make A Habit Of It ♡" reappears with even more power!!
description.ja: ☆あたし, 白鳥なぎさには、だれにもいえないヒミツがあるの。 それは, 男の子のフリをして,フツーの中学校に通っていること♡大人気の「くせになりそう♡」が,さらにパワーアップして,再登場!!

description.en: Reimu x Yukari x Ran x Crippling Depression

"10 years, live as if you were a dead mouse for at least 10 years. I won't meddle with however you live your life after that."

Jeanne, the girl who was praised as a war hero. During the civil war, in order to prevent the emperor from running away, she chopped off his right arm which made her the emperor's target. 

After changing her name and fleeing to a barren land, she hid herself amongst the <Blue Blood>, a criminal investigation unit specializing in crimes committed by aristocrats. 

She spent a peaceful 10 years along with her new colleagues whom she solved various cases with. But, the past she came to forget starts to catch up to her!

As if the sudden appearance of the lieutenant from her past who had a crush on her and her dull subordinate who keeps acting suspiciously wasn't enough headache, now even a scammer impersonating as her appears?!

"...This is insane, am I still drunk?" The unpredictable mystery of the war hero who became a lazy detective begins!"
description.fr:
"Pendant 10 ans, vivez comme si vous étiez une souris morte. Je ne me mêlerai pas de ce que vous vivrez après ça."

Jeanne, une femme qui a été louée comme une héros de guerre. Pendant la guerre civile, pour empêcher l’empereur de s’enfuir, elle lui coupa le bras droit, ce qui en fit la cible de l’empereur.

Après avoir changé de nom et s’être enfuie dans une terre aride, elle s’est cachée parmi une unité d’enquête criminelle spécialisée dans les crimes commis par des aristocrates.

Elle a passé 10 ans en paix avec ses nouveaux collègues avec qui elle a résolu divers cas. Mais le passé qu’elle est venue oublier commence à la rattraper !

Comme si l’apparition soudaine du lieutenant de son passé qui avait le béguin pour elle et son ennuyeux subalterne qui continue à agir de façon suspecte n’était pas assez de mal de tête, maintenant même un escroc se faisant passer pour elle apparaît.

"...C’est fou, suis-je ivre?"

Le passé de Jeanne qui est devenue une détective paresseuse commence !"

description.en:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
description.fr:
Terriblement assassinée par son amant, Margaret renaît sous le nom de Mag sept ans plus tard et vit une nouvelle vie.

Mag, qui ne connaissait pas le monde, pourra-t-elle s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie ?
description.ko:
"저를 용서하지 마세요."
 
사랑하는 연인에게 끔찍하게 살해당한 마가렛은
7년 후 '매그'로써 다시 태어나 새로운 삶을 살아간다.
 
세상 물정 모르던 '매그'는 새로운 삶을 잘 적응해 나갈 수 있을까...?
그녀의 죽음에 얽힌 진상과 인물들의 성장 러브 스토리!

description.en: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトは異世界で勇者になったけど、俺だけ現代日本に置き去りにされました

altTitles.en: My Classmates Became Heroes in Another World, But I was Left Behind in Modern Japan

altTitles.pt-br: Meus colegas de classe se tornaram heróis em outro mundo, mas fui deixado para tras no Japão moderno

description.en:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?
description.ja:
「おめでとう！　君たち25人は世界を救う勇者に選ばれました！」

中学3年の夏休み前、突然現れた女神・アシェラによって行われたクラス単位の異世界転移。
26人の生徒は異世界で勇者になれるよう、スキルやチート能力を使うことができるステータスを与えられ転移させられる。しかしその人数は25人――転校したばかりでカウントされていなかった少年・伊織修は現代日本に置き去りにされた。

異世界で鍛練し、来る勇者としての戦いに備えるクラスメイトとは違い、平和な日本で修は与えられたステータスの研究に没頭する。密かにスキルの性能の試行錯誤をしつつ、その力で時折身の回りの人助けをしていた修だが、いつの間にか世界の組織から狙われるような存在になっていて――？

description.en:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

title.en: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer's First IRL Meet-Up

altTitles.ja: 53歳で初めてオフ会に参加しました

altTitles.ja-ro: 53-sai de Hajimete Off-kai ni Sanka Shimashita

description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

altTitles.ja: まじとら！

description.en:
Minami-kun spots a poster recruiting new members for the Magical Girl Club. Thinking "Cosplay cuties woohoo!" he decides to join… What the hell!? It's not cosplay, we actually become magical girls??  
  
A slice of life love-comedy revolving around magical girls and slippery slopes.
description.es:
Minami-kun ve un cartel para llamar la atención a aquellos interesados en unirse al Club de Chicas Mágicas. Pensando en "¡Ver chicas guapas en cosplay, yujuu!" decide entrar... ¿¡Pero qué demonios!? Esto no es un cosplay, ¿de verdad nos hemos transformado en chicas mágicas?

Una comedia romántica que gira en torno a las chicas mágicas y situaciones peligrosas.
description.ru:
Минами-кун заметил постер с приглашением в Клуб Девочек-Волшебниц. Подумав: «Ничоси, халявный косплей!», он решил присоединиться… Вот только он не знал, что это не косплей, а он сам станет Девочкой-волшебницей!  
  
  
Originally found on MinComi: <http://www.mincomi.jp/title/?title=327416>  
Twitter [@yutakashii](https://twitter.com/yutakashii)  
Pixiv: <http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=200861>  
<http://www.ebookjapan.jp/ebj/author/78088/>

title.en: After 100,000 Years of Training in a Super Difficult Dungeon, I Became the World's Strongest ~The Weakest Incompetent Gains the Upper Hand~

altTitles.ja: 超難関ダンジョンで10万年修行した結果、世界最強に ～最弱無能の下剋上～

description.en: "The most incompetent person in the world ". Kai Heinemann received this gift at the age of 13. The effects of the gift resulted in Kai's significantly reduced physical abilities, and he became despised and bullied in the gifted supremacy of Lamour. Kai is forced to leave his home and is attacked on his way to the royal capital, and while desperately running away, he wanders into a dungeon. In the dungeon, he had to clear the "Trial of the Gods" to get out, and the time did not progress. Kai, feeling like he was going to die, spent 100,000 years clearing the dungeon. In the process of clearing the trial of the gods, Kai becomes the most powerful being in the world, gaining unique and strong friends along the way.
description.ja: 【この世で一番の無能】・・・13歳でこのギフトを得たカイ・ハイネマンは、ギフトの効果で身体能力が著しく低くなる。周囲からのいじめにより国を去ることになったカイは、旅の途中で「神々の試練」を与えるダンジョンに迷い込んでしまい――？

title.en: Yuri Yuri Panic ~Toutosugiru Jian ga Hasseishiteimasu!~

altTitles.ja: ゆりゆりぱにっく～尊すぎる事案が発生しています！～

altTitles.en: Yuri Yuri Panic ~ An Extremely Precious Affair has Begun!~

description.en: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...? A girl-meets-girl school romantic comedy where a girl and her yuri-brained imaginary friend Omochi get caught up in a precious affair!!

title.en: Tensei Idol to Doruota no Kishi

altTitles.ja: 転生アイドルとドルオタの騎士
転生アイドルとドルオタの騎士 ‐恋人編‐

altTitles.en: Reincarnation Idol & Idol Freak Knight - Lover’s Episode

description.en:
After going through several lifetimes, Takao, a former knight, is currently living as an office worker in modern Japan. After discovering Hikaru, who is the reincarnation of the prince he served and was unable to protect until the end in their past lives, he swore to protect Hikaru in this life by being a hardcore fan.
For the sake of protecting Hikaru from a closer position, Takao decided to become his manager. But after Hikaru, who has an aloof personality this time compared to their past lives, showed him a smile directed only to him, Takao starts to feel another type of feeling budding within him!

altTitles.ja: さくやさんといぬさくやさん
くちびるから愛

description.en: Riku, a beloved handyman known throughout the town, struggles with crowds due to his sensitive ears.After failing his entrance exams for that very reason, the one who supported him was his high school friend, Sumiharu.Despite being busy running his own business, Riku found comfort in Sumiharu's companionship. However, oneway, during an ordinary phone call, Riku unexpectedly felt aroused just from hearing Sumiharu's voice.Confused by this sudden change in his feelings, Riku begins to notice that the physical closeness between him and Sumiharu is steadily increasing. What could this mean for their relationship?

altTitles.ja: 愛されたがりの白猫ミコさん

altTitles.en: Miko, a White Cat That Wants to Be Loved

description.en: Miko is a white cat who used to be a stray but has since become the most pampered cat in the world! she doesn't care if her owner is working or on a call -- she demands affection at all times.
description.ja:
元野良猫のミコさんは、超がつくほど甘えんぼ。
飼い主が仕事中でも電話中でもいついかなるときも愛されたくて仕方がない…。
そんなミコさんとの愛し愛される相思相愛コミックエッセイ!

altTitles.ja: 武蔵野線の姉妹

description.en:
A pair of sisters living in N City, Saitama prefecture…  
  
The older sister earned a large fortune while she was young. and now, She's a celeb neet who's sometimes afflicted by net addiction. Her name is "Midorikawa Ranko," or commonly called as "Ran."  
  
The younger sister is living off her older sister's fortune, wishing to progress in the normal society. her name is "Midorikawa Hikaru," commonly called as "Pandora."  
  
The gothic loli neet sisters are bringing you a somewhat harsh, moe comedy!

title.en: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom

altTitles.ja: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaigeganai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

altTitles.en: The Saint Whose Engagement Was Broken When She Became Too Perfect Is Sold off to a Neighboring Kingdom

altTitles.th: เพราะสมบูรณ์แบบจนไม่น่ารัก สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์จึงถูกถอนหมั้นและขายไปอาณาจักรข้างเคียง

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaige ga nai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

description.en:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
description.ja: “聖女”を代々輩出する家系に生まれたフィリアは、幼少からのスパルタ教育により「歴代最高の聖女」と評される程の実力を身につけ、完璧に仕事をこなしていた。だが、あまりの隙のなさに「完璧すぎて可愛げがない」と腫れ物のように扱われ、婚約者の第二王子ユリウスからも婚約破棄をされてしまう――。さらに“聖女”が不在のため苦しむ隣国との取引でフィリアは、莫大な金を対価に売られることに。隣国での悲惨な扱いを覚悟するフィリアだったが、待っていたのは予想外の大歓迎で……!?
description.pt-br: A família de Philia vem produzindo santos por gerações. Não é nenhuma surpresa que ela seja conhecida como a maior santa de todos os tempos e esteja prestes a se casar com o segundo príncipe, Julius. O que ninguém espera é que Julius cancele o noivado, alegando que a perfeição de Philia a torna sem charme e antipática. Para piorar a situação, Philia é enviada para um país vizinho em troca de ouro e recursos, forçando-a a deixar sua terra natal! Apesar de se preparar para maus-tratos, Philia encontra uma recepção calorosa em sua nova cidade, onde ela faz bom uso de suas habilidades santas, erguendo barreiras contra monstros e curando epidemias. Mas enquanto ela floresce em sua nova vida, sua terra natal está sob ameaça de destruição!

title.en: Tears by Day, Love by Night

description.en:
The first time, I wasn't considered a priority. Then, it didn't feel right to date men. The third time, I went on a blind date, to discover that I was dating a married man.  
  
Eunsoo's relationships always ended badly.  
  
But it's different this time. Just as he was about to be beaten up, Eunsoo is comforted by Hajoon, who appeared like a knight.   
  
But why would you… You're even comforting me in my dreams?!

altTitles.en: because the girls are all childish

altTitles.ja: みなそこにて

altTitles.en: At the Bottom of the Water

description.en:
In this town's lake, a man-eating mermaid is said to have been sunk to the bottom.

Today, the mermaid still wanders the town in search of a companion, stirring up the restless hearts of the people.

A modern day tale of foolish girls who can't survive in clear water.
description.vi: Người ta nói rằng dưới đáy hồ ở thị trấn này có một "người cá" chuyên ăn thịt người. Ngay cả bây giờ cũng vậy, người cá lang thang trong thị trấn để tìm kiếm bạn đồng hành, chạm đến những trái tim đang gợn. Đây là truyện ngụ ngôn hiện đại về những cô gái khờ khạo không thể sống nhờ nước sạch.

title.en: Ushiro no Seki no Gyaru ni Sukarete Shimatta -Mou Ore wa Damekamoshirenai-

altTitles.ja: うしろの席のぎゃるに好かれてしまった。　もう俺はダメかもしれない。

altTitles.en: The Gal is Sitting Behind Me, and Loves Me -Maybe I'm Screwed Already-

description.en:
***My school life has changed drastically just because she likes me that I barely talk with?!***

Yuizaki Shino, one of the most beautiful girls in the school is a classmate of Fujiwara Sandai sitting behind him. It was only on a whim that Sandai helped her out despite spent his days studying and not having a single friend. It was supposed to be―

*"I couldn't wait for after school! ....Hey, hold on a minute?"*

That day and moment led Sandai to start dating Shino. They spend time together after school, they keep up with each other's hobbies, and they stay over frequently.... She's kind-sweet and always clings to him. And somehow, the other classmates started to pay attention to Sandai, they slowly changing his style appearance, and there was a lot of talks around his belt. He's more unsettled than when Sandai alone before. ....Well, this kind of school life isn't so bad, is it?

---

****Note: Earlier release chapter will be on Monthly Comic Dengeki Daioh before Comic Walker release***
description.ja:
何の接点も無い彼女に好かれた…だけで、俺の学園生活が激変!?

　うしろの席の同級生で、学校有数の美少女ギャル・結崎志乃。

勉強ばかりで、友達が一人もいない日々を過ごす俺が、彼女を助けたのは、ほんの気まぐれにすぎなかった。
そのはずが――

「放課後が待ち遠しかった！　……ね、ちゅーして？」

　その出来事をきっかけに、俺は志乃と付き合うことになった。
学校が終われば一緒に過ごして、お互いの趣味に付き合って、頻繁にお泊まりして……
彼女は優しく、いつも俺にべったり。

　さらにクラスメイトに注目されるようになって、俺の見た目を改造してくれたり、俺の周りも騒がしく。
一人の時より、落ち着かないんだが……ま、こんな学校生活も悪くはないか。

---

- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054921974753)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202206ushironoseki)

altTitles.ja: (小春小径4) 乙女のプライド (東方Project)

description.en: Kasen talks a lot, but Reimu never seems to listen. So one day she decides to adopt the opposite attitude instead.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

altTitles.pt-br: O lado oculto da minha Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

altTitles.ja: 唯一無二の最強テイマー 〜国の全てのギルドで門前払いされたから、他国に行ってスローライフします〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuiitsu Muni No Saikyou Tamer: Koku No Subete No Guild De Monzenbarai Sareta Kara, Takoku Ni Itte Slow Life Shimasu

description.en:
Kohaku, is a tamer but doesn't have monster followers.
Treated as incompetent, he was actually the only human who could tame a "phantom beast" that ordinary people could not see.

A Tamer's adventure with the strongest monsters begins!
description.pt-br: Amber que é domador, mas não doma monstros normais. Tratado como incompetente, ele era na verdade o único ser humano a domar uma "espécie de besta fantasma" que era invisível para as pessoas comuns. Uma aventura de um domador de monstro mais forte!

altTitles.ja: ボツ子ちゃん
没キャラ

description.en: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"
